name: Super Girls: Craft & Build
description:
Amazing adventure with cute super heroines! In this game you will find elegant princesses and beautiful super girls and get to know them better. In the game you will not be bored with princesses and their friends. Communicate and make new friends, build your super heroic world!

Explore this wonderful land, find the perfect place to build your beautiful house, оrganize it with different types of interior, create a beautiful garden, and more!

A special version has three modes of play: Classic with survival and craft, Creative with a complete set of all the blocks and interior items and "Township" mode, where you can continue the development and construction of the city, which is inhabited by different characters, communicate with citizens, build your houses, shops, cafes, parks, or other creative construction!

Features:
- Completely free game.
- Many beautiful blocks and pieces of furniture.
- Explore the mine, mining treasures and make new friends.
- Mobile edition includes new maps and characters inhabiting this world!
